member.name: P:Screen_Shaper.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Screen_Shaper.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Screen_Shaper.My.Resources.Resources.DefaultRSSText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <rss version="2.0"><channel><title>RSS Feed Not Available</title><link>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=49536</link><description>The RSS feed could not be loaded.</description><language>en-us</language><ttl>1440</ttl><item><title>You may not be connected to the internet.</title><description>If you are trying to use an RSS feed on the internet check your Internet connection.</description><link>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=49536</link></item><item><title>Try selecting a different RSS feed.</title><des[rest of String was truncated]";.

member.name: T:Screen_Shaper.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Build an RSSChannel from an XmlNode representing a Channel element inside an RSS 2.0 XML document.

member.name: T:Screen_Shaper.RssChannel
member.summary: Representation of a Channel element in an RSS 2.0 XML document.
member.remarks: One or more RssChannels are contained in an RssFeed. Use MainChannel property to access the primary channel.

member.param: The URL to read the RSS feed from.

member.summary: Gets the number of articles that will be displayed.

member.name: P:Screen_Shaper.ItemListView`1.NumArticleRows
member.summary: Gets the number of rows that will appear in the display.
member.remarks: This may be more than NumArticles if there are less articles available than would fill up the minimum number of rows.
